comments: Number of integer sequences of length n+1 with sum zero and sum of absolute values 4. - _R. H. Hardin_, Feb 22 2009Partial sums of A034262. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Jun 23 2013
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: Equals 2 * A002817 and (A058919(n-1) - 1)/2.G.f.: (-2*x*(x^2+x+1))/(x-1)^5. - Maksym Voznyy (voznyy(AT)mail.ru), Jul 27 2009
mathematica: a[n_]:=Sum[i+i^3, {i, 1, n}]; (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 05 2008 *)
